TopicTitle: Unity Blender Parttools WHATS GOING ON?!

Articles.Content:
I am so confused! I am trying to make a basic part for KSP in blender but searching the forums and other websites are talking about node_collider, I am installing unity just to see how it works with part making. I'd like an explanation on how you can create a basic part for KSP. Tutorials would be nice.

Thanks

P.S. If wrong sub forums SORRY!

The following is a compilation of add-on authoring information, including modelling, texturing, exporting via Unity and CFG file formats:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25013-Compilation-of-modding-information-links-for-0-19-20-21-22-23-Last-update-24th-Jan
